name: Present Shoot-out
description:
The children are impatient, they want their presents NOW!

Give the children their presents by using your present shooting cannon, buy upgrades and even more cannons to prevent yourself from getting taken over by the children!

The game includes: 3 different enemies with different ways of trying to attack you, one of them being a FINAL BOSS, and 5 available upgrades!

This game is Danielmoj's entry to the Extra Credits 2018 Holiday Game Jam.
